name: Aaram Baagh Pushkar

reviews.text: We recently spent a night in this hotel. The first thing is the road to the hotel. Quite a way out of Pushkar and more of a bone shattering track than road. The room/tent we stayed in was filthy. The canvas covering the walls was covered in dirt. The covering on the chair in my room was so stained I couldn't bring myself to sit on it. We had our own private pool but no water in it. The blind in my room didn't work so spent most of the time in the dark.
reviews.title: Could have been nice.

reviews.text: The grounds could have been beautiful if only they were maintained properly. A lot of ponds everywhere but none of them had any water in them and were filthy. The main swimming pool did have water in it but was full of pigeons. No wifi. Overall very disappointing.
reviews.title: Fantastic Place to Stay

reviews.text: Away from the hustle n bustle of the city, situated in the calm environs, very nice hospitality, its a great place to stay while in pushkar. the best part were the mini-private pools and a private garden! its quite sure that i would choose this place whenever i visit pushkar next.
reviews.title: Close to nature

reviews.text: Our stay at Aaram Bagh was pleasent one with excellent hospitality and picturesque landscape. The rooms, infinity pool, lawns, restraunt and bar are really good. The best part is the private mini pool and garden with every room.
reviews.title: So far the best leisure stay till now...

reviews.text: Aaram baug stands to its name in luxury, leisure and hospitality.... great fun. Must visit, must see and must experience. Right from food to cleanliness everything had been so perfec. Its about livinh the life KINGSIZE. I strongly recommend. And I am visiting it soon again.
reviews.title: Excellent Place for Holiday

reviews.text: “Very nice way of welcome in real traditional style...front desk is very cooperative in all aspects like from starting from welcoming, check in , guiding ways, arrangements, so attentive, and concern greeting way.. till checkout ... like VIP feeling... but something they need to really want to improve in food quality, hygienic environment, delay in services...which really make our feel down....a big thanks for Mr Singh
reviews.title: “Feel like VIP”

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room Tip: just coordinate with main reception to make things more easy...
reviews.title: Good Property...hopeless food...!!!

reviews.text: Aaram Bagh, Pushkar is a nice property with well built rooms and nice gardens. We stayed this weekend in the Arabian Villas of the resort and the rooms were spacious, well maintained and clean. The private splash pool was not clean although but the management cleaned in on request. The property is quite out of town hence its very quiet and peaceful, well maintained gardens. But the worst thing here was the food, it was just hopeless...really not a worth of the price they charge for the food...any roadside eatery would be better than the food here...sorry for being harsh but was seriously disappointed with the food served there.
reviews.title: awsome;magnificent

reviews.text: From the checkin to the check out........we enjoyed every minute tht we stayed at the Resort
reviews.title: Luxurious and relexing

reviews.text: On checking in we felt like royalty as we were welcomed with garland, tikkas and iced welcome drink. we were shown to our rooms in the Arabian villa section. the tent like rooms were actually
reviews.title: If service/management is ignored, a good place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The property was new and is quite far from Pushkar lake. The approach road was terrible! I could not take out my Mercedes for sight-seeing. I had to hire a Taxi for the purpose.
reviews.title: Questionable Quality of Food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Planning of cottages seemed very good but the property lacked the badly needed green cover. I wish the owners had put more efforts in landscaping.
reviews.title: Superb experience!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The cottage was self sufficient with a pantry. Rooms were quite spacious for the tariff.
reviews.title: Great Pushkar Weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There was a problem with the food though. My buttermilk had some impurity and I had taken a photograph of the same. it is being uploaded.
reviews.title: “Memories for Life”

reviews.text: Wow...what a place...We ( my husband,me,n my 8 months daughter) had wonderful experience with aaram bagh...the resort was awsome with great scenic beauty...the hospitality was too good...
reviews.title: A true Gem in the middle of nowhere...

reviews.text: The sunset and the infinite pool over looking the mountains were breath taking. Food could be less oily. Real value for money. They have a concept of different civilizations. The dip pool is there in every room
reviews.title: Quiet and romantic

reviews.text: This beautiful property is located amidst the serene desert, few kilometers from the holy city of Pushkar. I had a short stay at this place along with my family. We all loved everything about the place, right from the infinity pool to the garden area to dining and not to forget the tractor safari.
reviews.title: very nice experience

reviews.text: Though the food quality is average, but the breakfast buffet was very good.
reviews.title: agar dharti par kahi swarg hai to aaram baagh me hai

reviews.text: The staff is cordial and the property is very clean and nicely maintained.
reviews.title: value for money--AaramBaagh Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An experience worth taking.
reviews.title: Mix Bag Here !

description: Aaram Baagh Pushkar offers the guests an opportunity to bask in the royal charm of Indian Maharajas and Maharani's, which not only symbolize comfort and luxury but also reflects ther style of living.
